Not sure if my download got slightly corrupted somehow, but, at least in my file, at around 4:42 there's a litte "cut" on the video, and after that the sound if out of synch by 200ms. Since i was using VLC i just set the Audio Delay to 200ms (just press K on Vlc), and it's fine, but just letting you know.

Hey everyone! suck it up, you're getting this shit for free. I fyou use VLC it takes all of 3 seconds to fix, just go under Tools and click effects and syncronization and go to advance of audio over video and up it to 0.300s and it's working just fine.
